# No 1

```{r}
df <- data.frame(
  No = rep(1:8),
  Nama = c("Denora", "Rena", "Sam", "John", "Kira", "Zena", "William", "Ahlan"),
  Jenis_Kelamin = rep(c("Perempuan", "Laki-Laki"), each = 2),
  Gaji = seq(40000, 5000, -5000),
  Usia = rep(c(25, 26), c(4, 4))
)

print(df)


```

# No 2

```{r}
jenis_bilangan <- function(n) {
  for (i in 1:n) {
    if (i %% 2 == 0) {
      print(paste(i, "adalah bilangan genap"))
    } else {
      print(paste(i, "adalah bilangan ganjil"))
    }
  }
}

jenis_bilangan(20)

```
